title: Ryu in Smash Bros! - Kinda Funny Plays
description:
Tim and Nick show off the new Smash Bros. DLC.

Subscribe! https://www.youtube.com/user/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

This video was edited on an ORIGIN PC EVO15-S Laptop. Get your PC here: http://www.ORIGINPC.com

Each and every day, Tim Gettys, Greg Miller, and Colin Moriarty get together to talk videogames. 

Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Colin - http://www.twitter.com/NoTaxation

Music by Rakohus!: http://www.youtube.com/user/rakohus

Corrected phonetic mistakes and spelling errors:

* "Luca" → "Lucas" (correcting name)
* "Pit" → "Pit" (no correction needed, as it is a proper noun)
* "PK Fire" → "PK Fire" (no correction needed, as it is a game term)
* "SHO" → "SHO" (assuming this is an abbreviation or acronym and not a typo)

Capitalized proper nouns:

* "Lucas" (corrected to title case)
* "Pit" (already capitalized)
* "PK Fire" (already capitalized)

Removed no changes, as the original text does not contain any obvious errors that would alter its meaning.
